metadata.name: Power & The Plant
metadata.description:
A lightning bolt in the clouds near a decommissioned power plant reminded me of the type of power nature can produce at a moment's notice.


1 of 1


Camera: Nikon Z6 
Lens: Nikkor 50mm f/1.8 
Date Taken: July 12, 2021
 Location: Maryland
 Artist: Joe Cardamone
